casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF MASON H., etc. Broome County Department of Social Services, Respondent;
v.
Joseph H., Appellant. 2018-167 Court of Appeals of New York. February 15, 2018

Motion for assignment of an attorney for the child granted and the following is assigned as attorney for the child on this appeal: John A. Cirando, Esq., c/o D.J. & J.A. Cirando, Esqs., 101 South Salina Street, Syracuse, NY 13202-1350.
